title: Update CSS Scroll Snap Points
body: Now that both Firefox 39+ and Safari 9 supports it in addition to being in development in Chrome, updating the Scroll Snap Points implementation to match the current spec is crucial. The current implementation from the IE 10 days is outdated and incompatible with the changes made since then.

comments.body: An important point: this module is now a W3C Candidate Recommendation https://www.w3.org/TR/css-scroll-snap-1/
